Contributor: Riesenberg, Sidney H., artist.; E. Ketterlinus & Co., printer.;
Note: Signed "Sidney H. Riesenberg." Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to buy more Liberty Bonds. Illustration shows two men fighting on the battlefield. One man is wounded.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I

Title: Lend as they fight
